attacks.name: Stomp
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Fire Spin
attacks.effect: Discard 2 basic Energy cards attached to Entei or this attack does nothing.

abilities.name: Beating Wings
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Pidgeot is your Active Pokémon, you may shuffle 1 of your Benched Pokémon and all cards attached to it into your deck. This power can’t be used if Pidgeot is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Sharp Beak
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Roar
attacks.effect: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon, if any.

attacks.name: Thunder
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, Raikou does 20 damage to itself.

abilities.name: Mirror Coat
abilities.effect: If Suicune is Burned or Poisoned by an opponent’s attack (even if Suicune is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokémon is now affected by the same Special Conditions (1 if there is only 1).

attacks.name: Bubblebeam
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Rage
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Tauros.

attacks.name: Wide Solarbeam
attacks.effect: Does 20 damage to 2 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Hard Plant
attacks.effect: Venusaur can’t use Hard Plant during your next turn.

attacks.name: Poison Seed
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

cards.name: Mr. Briney’s Compassion
cards.effect: Choose 1 of your Pokémon in play (excluding Pokémon-ex). Return that Pokémon and all cards attached to it to your hand.

cards.name: Multi Technical Machine 01
cards.effect: Attach this card to 1 of your Pokémon in play. That Pokémon may use this card’s attack instead of its own. At the end of your turn, discard Multi Technical Machine 01.

cards.name: Pokémon Park
cards.effect: Once during each player’s turn, when that player attaches an Energy card from his or her hand to 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon, he or she removes 1 damage counter from that Pokémon.

cards.name: TV Reporter
cards.effect: Draw 3 cards. Then discard any 1 card from your hand.

attacks.name: Sand Attack
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent’s next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Paralyzing Kiss
attacks.effect: If there are 2 Defending Pokémon in play, choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon. That Pokémon is now Paralyzed. (If there is only 1 Defending Pokémon, this attack does nothing.)

attacks.name: Fast Stream
attacks.effect: Move 1 Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon to the other Defending Pokémon. (Ignore this effect if your opponent has only 1 Defending Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Double Spin
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Body Slam
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Thunder Jolt
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, Pikachu does 10 damage to itself.

abilities.name: Time Reversal
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when you put Celebi ex from your hand onto your Bench, you may search your discard pile for a card, show it to your opponent, and put it on top of your deck.

attacks.name: Psychic Shield
attacks.effect: Prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Celebi ex by your opponent’s Pokémon-ex during your opponent’s next turn.
